item.title: About
item.description: Yang-Hsi Su A first year Ph.D. student at University of Michigan in Electrical and Computer Engineering, advised by Prof. Alanson Sample. I am a member of Interactive, Sensing and Computing lab along with Amani Alkayyali, Jaylin Herskovitz, and Yasha Iravantchi. My main focus is finding ways to embed radio waves into human computer interaction applications. As a die-hard fan of Doraemon, my ultimate goal is to have a forth-dimension pocket that has all kinds of cool gadgets like the one Doraemon has.
